title: Who is the most amazing human being ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey guys, Here you go. It’s not because I write that, doesn’t mean it should really required to be true. However, to put it strongly from my perception and in a simple one liner, “Amazing Human Being, a creature created to create Compassionate Love & Health in this Universe by understanding global consciousness.” Yes. It’s YOU. Now, let me tell you how to bring out your “amazing human being” outside. It’s you, who is the only reason behind every single challenges around you. Everyday you see, meet or experience different challenges in your life. However, every challenges are solved at some point of time with or without your effort. Your close observation of all your challenges is ready to explain that, you are appended to be one of the reasons behind all challenges that you face in your life. After all, you have read and copied habits from various types of people, education, society around you and books which comprises of history & stories of Leaders. It's time to create your own history with your good habits & thought process. It needs courage to accept the change and build your own life History. Now, Let me give you a chance to recreate your life from zero. It's very simple. Just 3 Questions can change your life. Just take a piece of paper to write answer for all 3 questions. What is the purpose of your life?Where does happiness comes from?List out 10 different strength & lovable characters of your loved ones?Now, start writing answers for the questions. I’m Surprised to see your knowledge which is gradually increasing your thoughts & level of understanding after writing answer for this question. Now, I’ve TWO Simple TASKS for you to feel that, “Amazing Human Being” inside you. TASK 01. Start taking efforts for your purpose of life through ACTIONS. I know you face issues & challenges towards your day to day life. Please do read, “I like to be the change which I want to see in this world” to overcome the challenges faced. TASK 02. I Swear & Promise you that, you can easily fit your happiness that you have written in these 8 categories mentioned below, Physical Mental Career Financial Relationship Fun Adventure & Service which actually creates or generates real happiness in your life with the help of four primary chemicals in the brain that effect happiness: dopamine, oxytocin, serotonin, and endorphins. So, make sure you invest your time on things that keeps you happy. TASK 03. Start finding opportunities to appreciate and shower your sincere gratitude to all your loved ones (for all their support, love and best attitude) before they leave you from this universe. Here is an opportunity to think about your Friends, Relatives, Family, Neighbor, Bus mate, Colleagues, Co-Workers, Co-passenger, Strangers & Every Individuals who have helped, supported, shared and gave few minutes of their life just for your goodness. Yes. It’s YOU, who is an amazing human being capable of understanding real purpose of life by creating compassionate love & health in this universe beyond all challenges that you face in your day to day life. Life is more about reading, learning and understanding. However, Applying the wisdom through ACTIONS can only create impact and take you to the place where you wanted to be. I'm Happy to be the Change. And, Hope from now, you will be realizing your “amazing human being” inside YOU.
Sathya Sai Baba was the avatar of this age.
